body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="RQO"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.194"/> <code code="NeweExam.23" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Lung Assessment Finding"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation>
